Interface ConnectFourUIInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
ConnectFourGUI, ConnectFourTUI, ConnectFourUI
public interface ConnectFourUIInterface
ConnectFourUIInterface This is the parent interface for all UIs
Version:
Assignment Hand-In - PE7070
Author:
Byron Glover

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    checkWin()
    checkWin This method displays the winner of the game
    void
    clearGame()
    clearGame This method clears the game board and any record of moves, to reset the game.
    void
    displayWelcomeMessage()
    displayWelcomeMessage This method displays a welcome message to the user
    void
    loadGame()
    loadGame Loads the saved state of the game.
    void
    printToUser(String message)
    printToUser This method is for printing information to the user - to allow them to understand the game flow.
    void
    replay()
    replay This method gives the user the option to play again, or quit, once the game is won
    void
    saveGame()
    saveGame To be implemented by student - This method should save the current game state
    void
    startNewGame()
    startNewGame This method sets up a new game in the console, displaying the welcome message, the game, and the menu.
    void
    undoMove()
    undoMove Undoes the previous move made in the game, along with the corresponding computer move

  • Method Details

    • startNewGame

      void startNewGame()
      startNewGame This method sets up a new game in the console, displaying the welcome message, the game, and the menu.

    • saveGame

      void saveGame()
      saveGame To be implemented by student - This method should save the current game state

    • undoMove

      void undoMove()
      undoMove Undoes the previous move made in the game, along with the corresponding computer move

    • loadGame

      void loadGame()
      loadGame Loads the saved state of the game.

    • clearGame

      void clearGame()
      clearGame This method clears the game board and any record of moves, to reset the game.

      void displayWelcomeMessage()
      displayWelcomeMessage This method displays a welcome message to the user

    • checkWin

      void checkWin()
      checkWin This method displays the winner of the game

    • replay

      void replay()
      replay This method gives the user the option to play again, or quit, once the game is won

    • printToUser

      void printToUser(String message)
      printToUser This method is for printing information to the user - to allow them to understand the game flow.
      Parameters:
      message - - the message to be sent to the user.
